document.full_text: martin st. louis and teddy purcell each scored twice, and the tampa bay lightning stayed alive in the eastern conference finals with a 5-4 win over the boston bruins.
document.title: lightning 5, bruins 4: lightning beat bruins, force game 7 in east finals
lines_and_colors: martin st. louis and teddy purcell each scored twice, and the tampa bay lightning stayed alive in the eastern conference finals with a 5-4 win over the boston bruins.
